attributes.title: The WORST app EVER
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I’ve ever downloaded onto my phone. Save yourself. This app can’t do anything right just like our so called president of the United States. Distrusting app by a disgusting human.

attributes.title: It’s HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: It drains your battery so fast and it will crash your phone. It glitches like every five seconds and will give give your phone viruses.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, Donald Trump puncher me in the face and curb stomped me. He then proceeded to spit in my face and screamed “TRUMP 2020” at me. I can not believe Apple would let an app like this be made. It’s downright unconstitutional and against my rights as an American.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app is so terrible it literally pushed my Grandma down the stairs and proceeded to sit on her. Then it took my pet fish and ate it. Unbelievable. Also it’s always running around undressed. Fix it

attributes.title: THE WORST APP IN EXISTENCE!!
attributes.review: I opened this app after downloading it and what I saw made me disgusted. Some guy dressed in Cheeto dust and a cheap blonde wig from Wish impersonating my WONDERFUL President. What a disgrace. This app needs to be deleted. Our COUNTRY is better off without it. 🤬😤😒

attributes.title: Worst don’t get it🤦🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: This is the worst app it glitches a lot and it’s super slow. Takes a lot of space in the phone and it’s not worth it. Pls don’t waist your time.

attributes.title: do not trust this app
attributes.review: this app is awful the second i downloaded it my phone began to turn into a real live dinosaur. it then destroyed my home after eating my baby. because it had all of my information it contacted my grandmother to find out where she lived. once this information was obtained by the dino it found her and burned her house down.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app is awful and every time I go on it freezes up and it needs a lot of help just delete it plz

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. So many glitches and I got a pop up talking about how Mexicans and Chinese people aren’t welcome in HIS country?? Disgusting and horrible I do not recommend this horrendous app.

attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: This app completely messed up my phone  and now I can’t delete it I feel like the government is watching me
